author: jasperlauwers
body:
Maintainance of the HLTValidation Higgs code, updating the PU range and correcting some inconsistenties. In more detail:

hltHiggsValidator_cfi.py:
- PU binning: 10 bins between [0,50]
- Added a hltHiggsPostHggControlPaths directory

hltHiggsPostProcessors_cff.py:
- Added EffSummary and Vtx plots for b directories
- Corrected the TTHbbej rec EffSummary in ROOT6
- Removed empty gen trueVx histograms and gen eff for NminOne plots.

The total number of histograms is slightly decreasing. Comparison done with DQMStoreStats module:

| subsystem/folder | histograms | bins | Empty bins | Empty/Total | bins per histogram | MB | kB per histogram |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Higgs after | 1295 | 47836 | 43239 | 0.904 | 36.9 | 0.182 | 0.144 |
| Higgs before | 1301 | 47692 | 43136 | 0.904 | 36.7 | 0.182 | 0.143 |
title: Update efficiency plots, PU range and added HggControlPath directory
